languages.text: {n}Маражай смеется.{/n} "Ты, вероятно, весьма невысокого мнения обо мне, если считаешь, что я верю хотя бы единому твоему слову о моем "долгожданном" возвращении в кабал... но допустим. Допустим, я ослеп и оглох, а потому — подумаю о твоем предложении".

{n}Marazhai laughs.{/n} "You must think very poorly of me if you expect me to believe a single word you said about my 'long-awaited' return to the Kabal... But I will indulge you. Let us pretend I am blind and deaf, and therefore will consider your offer."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай смеется.{/n} "Ты, вероятно, весьма невысокого мнения обо мне, если считаешь, что я верю хотя бы единому твоему слову о моем "долгожданном" возвращении в кабал... но допустим. Допустим, я ослеп и оглох, а потому — подумаю о твоем предложении".

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lacht.{/n} "Ihr scheint ja sehr wenig von mir zu halten, wenn Ihr erwartet, dass ich Euch auch nur ein einziges Wort über meine 'lang ersehnte' Rückkehr zur Kabale glaube ... Aber gut, ich spiele mit. Geben wir vor, dass ich blind und taub bin und Euer Angebot daher in Erwägung ziehe."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs.{/n} "You must think very poorly of me if you expect me to believe a single word you said about my 'long-awaited' return to the Kabal... But I will indulge you. Let us pretend I am blind and deaf, and therefore will consider your offer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lacht.{/n} "Ihr scheint ja sehr wenig von mir zu halten, wenn Ihr erwartet, dass ich Euch auch nur ein einziges Wort über meine 'lang ersehnte' Rückkehr zur Kabale glaube ... Aber gut, ich spiele mit. Geben wir vor, dass ich blind und taub bin und Euer Angebot daher in Erwägung ziehe."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋大笑起来。{/n}“你说所有人都‘非常期待’我重返阴谋团，可要是你以为我真的相信半个字，那恐怕就把我想得太蠢了……不过，我愿意迁就你一下。就假装我又瞎又聋吧，我会考虑一下你的提议。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs.{/n} "You must think very poorly of me if you expect me to believe a single word you said about my 'long-awaited' return to the Kabal... But I will indulge you. Let us pretend I am blind and deaf, and therefore will consider your offer."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋大笑起来。{/n}“你说所有人都‘非常期待’我重返阴谋团，可要是你以为我真的相信半个字，那恐怕就把我想得太蠢了……不过，我愿意迁就你一下。就假装我又瞎又聋吧，我会考虑一下你的提议。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai éclate de rire.{/n} « Vous devez avoir une bien piètre opinion de moi si vous pensez que je vais avaler une fable sur mon retour "tant attendu" à la Kabale... Mais soyons fous. Faisons comme si j'étais sourd et aveugle, et que j'étais donc prêt à écouter votre proposition. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs.{/n} "You must think very poorly of me if you expect me to believe a single word you said about my 'long-awaited' return to the Kabal... But I will indulge you. Let us pretend I am blind and deaf, and therefore will consider your offer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai éclate de rire.{/n} « Vous devez avoir une bien piètre opinion de moi si vous pensez que je vais avaler une fable sur mon retour "tant attendu" à la Kabale... Mais soyons fous. Faisons comme si j'étais sourd et aveugle, et que j'étais donc prêt à écouter votre proposition. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se ríe.{/n} «Debes de pensar muy mal de mí si esperas que me crea una sola palabra sobre mi "esperado" regreso a la Kábala... pero te seguiré el juego. Finjamos que soy ciego y sordo y que voy a plantearme tu oferta».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs.{/n} "You must think very poorly of me if you expect me to believe a single word you said about my 'long-awaited' return to the Kabal... But I will indulge you. Let us pretend I am blind and deaf, and therefore will consider your offer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se ríe.{/n} «Debes de pensar muy mal de mí si esperas que me crea una sola palabra sobre mi "esperado" regreso a la Kábala... pero te seguiré el juego. Finjamos que soy ciego y sordo y que voy a plantearme tu oferta».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイが笑う。{/n}「陰謀団への『待望の』帰還に関してだが、お前が言った言葉を俺が信じると思うなら、お前は俺様のことを全くわかっていないな。だがお前の思うようにしてやろう。俺は目も見えず耳も聞こえないふりをしてやる。ゆえにお前の申し出を考えようじゃないか」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs.{/n} "You must think very poorly of me if you expect me to believe a single word you said about my 'long-awaited' return to the Kabal... But I will indulge you. Let us pretend I am blind and deaf, and therefore will consider your offer."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイが笑う。{/n}「陰謀団への『待望の』帰還に関してだが、お前が言った言葉を俺が信じると思うなら、お前は俺様のことを全くわかっていないな。だがお前の思うようにしてやろう。俺は目も見えず耳も聞こえないふりをしてやる。ゆえにお前の申し出を考えようじゃないか」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gülüyor.{/n} "Kabal'a 'uzun zamandır beklenen' dönüşüm hakkında söylediklerinin tek bir kelimesine dahi inanmamı bekliyorsan aptalın teki olduğumu düşünüyorsun demektir. Diyelim ki öyle olsun. Körüm, sağırım ve teklifini değerlendiriyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs.{/n} "You must think very poorly of me if you expect me to believe a single word you said about my 'long-awaited' return to the Kabal... But I will indulge you. Let us pretend I am blind and deaf, and therefore will consider your offer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gülüyor.{/n} "Benim Kabal'a 'uzun zamandır beklenen' dönüşüm hakkında söylediklerinin tek bir kelimesine bile inanmamı bekliyorsan, benim aptalın teki olduğumu düşünüyorsun demektir. Ama yüz vereyim hadi. Diyelim ki körüm ve sağırım ve teklifini değerlendiriyorum."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
